alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 09 at 3:05AM PST until March 11 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
